EmailTemplate.name: ENG-Hybrid-Cloud-Nurture.ENG-Hybrid Cloud-Early-04.04-30-Day-Trial
EmailTemplate.subject: Intelligent Private & Hybrid Cloud Management
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://vmturbo.com/download-vmturbo-operations-manager-direct?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Early04]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Unpredictable demand, especially with self-service portals, means higher risk to application performance. Public clouds offer a great option for congestion relief, but not all application workloads are created equal. VMTurbo intelligently manages workloads across private and hybrid cloud environments, determining what workloads to run where. VMTurbo treats the public cloud as an additional resource to meet application workload demand and assure performance. It maximizes utilization in a private cloud environment and bursts workloads to the public cloud as needed, based on real-time demand. Are you ready to see all that VMTurbo has to offer you? Give the free trial a shot <[[http://vmturbo.com/download-vmturbo-operations-manager-direct?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Early04]]> and see just how VMTurbo will drive your environment to perpetual health. <[[http://vmturbo.com/download-vmturbo-operations-manager-direct?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Early04]]> - The VMTurbo Team
